easy.english: Time is money
easy.metaphor: Time has the same value as precious metal

easy.english: Actions speak louder than words
easy.metaphor: What you do is more important than what you say

easy.english: Every cloud has a silver lining
easy.metaphor: There is something good in every bad situation

easy.english: A picture is worth a thousand words
easy.metaphor: Visual representation can convey complex ideas quickly

easy.english: The early bird catches the worm
easy.metaphor: Those who start early have an advantage

easy.english: Don't judge a book by its cover
easy.arabic: لا تحكم على الكتاب من غلافه
easy.metaphor: Don't judge based on appearances

easy.english: Better late than never
easy.metaphor: It's better to do something late than not at all

easy.english: Practice makes perfect
easy.metaphor: Repeated practice leads to mastery

easy.english: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade
easy.metaphor: Make the best of a bad situation

easy.english: The grass is always greener on the other side
easy.metaphor: Other people's situations seem better

easy.english: You can't have your cake and eat it too
easy.arabic: لا يمكن أن تحتفظ بالكعكة وتأكلها
easy.metaphor: You can't have everything

easy.english: Don't put all your eggs in one basket
easy.arabic: لا تضع كل البيض في سلة واحدة
easy.metaphor: Don't risk everything on one option

easy.english: Rome wasn't built in a day
easy.arabic: روما لم تُبن في يوم واحد
easy.metaphor: Great things take time

easy.english: When in Rome, do as the Romans do
easy.arabic: كن مع الناس في العيد ولو كنت صائماً
easy.metaphor: Adapt to local customs

easy.english: A penny saved is a penny earned
easy.arabic: القرش الأبيض ينفع في اليوم الأسود
easy.metaphor: Saving money is like earning money

easy.english: The squeaky wheel gets the grease
easy.metaphor: Those who complain get attention

easy.english: You reap what you sow
easy.metaphor: You get results based on your actions

easy.english: Don't bite the hand that feeds you
easy.metaphor: Don't harm those who help you

easy.english: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush
easy.arabic: عصفور في اليد خير من عشرة على الشجرة
easy.metaphor: Something certain is better than something uncertain

easy.english: Don't cry over spilled milk
easy.metaphor: Don't regret what's already done

easy.english: The pen is mightier than the sword
easy.metaphor: Words are more powerful than violence

easy.english: Curiosity killed the cat
easy.metaphor: Too much curiosity can be dangerous

easy.english: All that glitters is not gold
easy.metaphor: Appearances can be deceiving

easy.english: Strike while the iron is hot
easy.metaphor: Act when the opportunity is right

easy.english: Two heads are better than one
easy.metaphor: Working together is better than working alone

easy.english: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree
easy.metaphor: Children resemble their parents

easy.english: You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs
easy.arabic: لا تصنع عجة بدون كسر البيض
easy.metaphor: You can't achieve something without sacrifice

easy.english: A watched pot never boils
easy.metaphor: Time seems slower when you're waiting

easy.english: Don't count your chickens before they hatch
easy.arabic: لا تقل فول حتى يصير في المكيول
easy.metaphor: Don't assume success before it happens

easy.english: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
easy.metaphor: Beauty is subjective

easy.english: A stitch in time saves nine
easy.arabic: غرزة في وقتها تغني عن تسع
easy.metaphor: Fixing problems early prevents bigger problems

easy.english: Where there's smoke, there's fire
easy.metaphor: Rumors usually have some truth

easy.english: The best things in life are free
easy.metaphor: The most valuable things cost nothing

easy.english: Honesty is the best policy
easy.metaphor: Being truthful is always the right choice

easy.english: If you can't beat them, join them
easy.arabic: إن لم تستطع هزيمتهم فانضم إليهم
easy.metaphor: Sometimes it's better to cooperate than compete

easy.english: The customer is always right
easy.metaphor: In business, satisfy the customer

easy.english: Don't look a gift horse in the mouth
easy.metaphor: Don't criticize something you received for free

easy.english: A rolling stone gathers no moss
easy.arabic: الحجر المتدحرج لا ينبت عليه الطحلب
easy.metaphor: People who keep moving don't get stuck in routines

easy.english: Good things come to those who wait
easy.metaphor: Patience leads to good results

easy.english: Money doesn't grow on trees
easy.metaphor: Money is not easy to get

easy.english: The road to hell is paved with good intentions
easy.metaphor: Good intentions alone are not enough

easy.english: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make it drink
easy.arabic: تستطيع أن تقود الحصان للماء لكن لا تستطيع إجباره على الشرب
easy.metaphor: You can provide opportunities but can't force someone to use them

easy.english: Necessity is the mother of invention
easy.metaphor: Need drives creativity and innovation

easy.english: A chain is only as strong as its weakest link
easy.metaphor: A group is only as strong as its weakest member

easy.english: When the cat's away, the mice will play
easy.metaphor: People misbehave when authority is absent

easy.english: You scratch my back, I'll scratch yours
easy.arabic: يد تغسل يد والاثنتان تغسلان الوجه
easy.metaphor: Mutual help benefits everyone

easy.english: Actions speak louder than words
easy.metaphor: What you do matters more than what you say

medium.english: Don't throw the baby out with the bathwater
medium.arabic: لا ترم الطفل مع ماء الاستحمام
medium.metaphor: Don't discard something valuable while getting rid of something unwanted

medium.english: The devil is in the details
medium.metaphor: Small details can cause big problems

medium.english: Don't bite off more than you can chew
medium.arabic: لا تأخذ لقمة أكبر من فمك
medium.metaphor: Don't take on more than you can handle

medium.english: The grass is always greener on the other side
medium.metaphor: Other people's situations seem better than yours

medium.english: You can't judge a book by its cover
medium.arabic: لا تحكم على المرء من مظهره
medium.metaphor: Don't judge people by their appearance

medium.english: A leopard can't change its spots
medium.metaphor: People don't change their basic nature

medium.english: Don't put the cart before the horse
medium.metaphor: Do things in the right order

medium.english: You can't make a silk purse out of a sow's ear
medium.arabic: لا تصنع كيس حرير من أذن خنزير
medium.metaphor: You can't make something fine from poor materials

medium.english: Don't count your chickens before they hatch
medium.metaphor: Don't assume success before it happens

medium.english: The pot calling the kettle black
medium.metaphor: Criticizing someone for a fault you also have

medium.english: Don't wash your dirty linen in public
medium.arabic: ل تغسل ملابسك المتسخة أمام الناس
medium.metaphor: Don't discuss private problems publicly

medium.english: You can't have your cake and eat it too
medium.metaphor: You can't have two contradictory things

medium.english: The squeaky wheel gets the grease
medium.metaphor: Those who ask for attention get it

medium.english: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush
medium.metaphor: A sure thing is better than possibilities

medium.english: Don't look a gift horse in the mouth
medium.metaphor: Don't criticize free gifts

medium.english: Strike while the iron is hot
medium.metaphor: Act when conditions are favorable

medium.english: Too many cooks spoil the broth
medium.metaphor: Too many people managing something ruins it

medium.english: You can't teach an old dog new tricks
medium.metaphor: Older people resist learning new things

medium.english: The early bird catches the worm
medium.arabic: من جد وجد ومن زرع حصد
medium.metaphor: Hard work leads to success

medium.english: Don't cry over spilled milk
medium.metaphor: Don't regret things you can't change

medium.english: A penny saved is a penny earned
medium.arabic: من أمن العذاب هان عليه السهر
medium.metaphor: Saving prevents future hardship

medium.english: The pen is mightier than the sword
medium.metaphor: Wisdom is more powerful than force

medium.english: All that glitters is not gold
medium.metaphor: Appearances can be deceiving

medium.english: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
medium.metaphor: Everyone has different preferences

medium.english: Curiosity killed the cat
medium.metaphor: Too much curiosity can be dangerous

medium.english: When in Rome, do as Romans do
medium.metaphor: Adapt to local customs when visiting

medium.english: A watched pot never boils
medium.arabic: إذا أردت أن تطاع فاطلب المستطاع
medium.metaphor: Reasonable requests are more likely to be fulfilled

medium.english: You reap what you sow
medium.metaphor: You get results that match your actions

medium.english: Where there's smoke, there's fire
medium.metaphor: Every successful person has support

medium.english: The best things in life are free
medium.metaphor: Moderation is best in everything

medium.english: Honesty is the best policy
medium.metaphor: Truth should be told even if it's unpleasant

medium.english: If you can't beat them, join them
medium.metaphor: Never lose hope in God's mercy

medium.english: The customer is always right
medium.arabic: ليس بالضرورة أن يكون المشتري محقاً
medium.metaphor: Buyers are not always correct in their judgment

medium.english: A rolling stone gathers no moss
medium.metaphor: Stagnation leads to decay

medium.english: Good things come to those who wait
medium.arabic: إذا لم تكن ذئباً أكلتك الذئاب
medium.metaphor: You must be strong to survive

medium.english: Money doesn't grow on trees
medium.metaphor: Money doesn't come easily

hard.english: The road to hell is paved with good intentions
hard.arabic: إن الله لا يغير ما بقوم حتى يغيروا ما بأنفسهم
hard.metaphor: Change must come from within

hard.english: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make it drink
hard.arabic: لا يؤمن أحدكم حتى يحب لأخيه ما يحب لنفسه
hard.metaphor: True faith requires caring for others

hard.english: Necessity is the mother of invention
hard.arabic: العبقرية واحد بالمائة إلهام وتسعة وتسعون بالمائة جهد
hard.metaphor: Success is mostly hard work, not just talent

hard.english: A chain is only as strong as its weakest link
hard.arabic: المؤمن للمؤمن كالبنيان يشد بعضه بعضا
hard.metaphor: Unity makes people stronger

hard.english: When the cat's away, the mice will play
hard.metaphor: Prevention is better than cure

hard.english: You scratch my back, I'll scratch yours
hard.metaphor: Working together leads to success

hard.english: Don't bite the hand that feeds you
hard.arabic: من علمني حرفاً صرت له عبداً
hard.metaphor: Be grateful to those who teach you

hard.english: The pen is mightier than the sword
hard.metaphor: Knowledge illuminates while ignorance darkens

hard.english: Rome wasn't built in a day
hard.metaphor: Great achievements start with small steps

hard.english: Too many cooks spoil the broth
hard.arabic: رأي الجماعة أصوب من رأي الفرد
hard.metaphor: Collective wisdom is better than individual opinion

hard.english: You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs
hard.metaphor: Don't despair, divine help is always present

hard.english: A leopard can't change its spots
hard.metaphor: Natural character overcomes learned behavior

hard.english: Don't put the cart before the horse
hard.metaphor: Every situation requires appropriate words

hard.english: You can't make a silk purse out of a sow's ear
hard.metaphor: You cannot give what you don't have

hard.english: The devil is in the details
hard.arabic: الله في عون العبد ما دام العبد في عون أخيه
hard.metaphor: Divine help comes to those who help others

hard.english: Don't throw the baby out with the bathwater
hard.metaphor: Wisdom can come from unexpected sources

hard.english: Strike while the iron is hot
hard.metaphor: Caught between two difficult choices

hard.english: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush
hard.metaphor: Unity brings strength

hard.english: Don't count your chickens before they hatch
hard.metaphor: Achieving excellence requires sacrifice

hard.english: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
hard.metaphor: People have different inherent values

hard.english: Curiosity killed the cat
hard.metaphor: People oppose what they don't understand

hard.english: A watched pot never boils
hard.metaphor: Patience opens the door to relief

hard.english: You reap what you sow
hard.arabic: كن في الدنيا كأنك غريب أو عابر سبيل
hard.metaphor: Live in this world as a temporary visitor

hard.english: Where there's smoke, there's fire
hard.metaphor: Actions are judged by intentions

hard.english: The best things in life are free
hard.arabic: ما قل وكفى خير مما كثر وألهى
hard.metaphor: Simple sufficiency is better than abundant distraction

hard.english: Honesty is the best policy
hard.arabic: الصادق من صدق في أقواله وأفعاله
hard.metaphor: True honesty includes both words and actions

hard.english: A rolling stone gathers no moss
hard.metaphor: Being active brings blessings

hard.english: Good things come to those who wait
hard.metaphor: Divine provision is guaranteed from above

hard.english: Money doesn't grow on trees
hard.metaphor: Wealth and children are worldly decorations

hard.english: The customer is always right
hard.arabic: ليس من العدل أن تكون دائماً محقاً
hard.metaphor: It's not fair to always be right
